title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies: Gradual Responsibility Transfer Mentoring Program for Teacher Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can execute science class leadership with 80% or higher accuracy by applying a gradual release of responsibility model in a VR simulation environment.
Learners build social capital required for teacher leadership role transitions with 70% or higher participation through mentor-mentee collaboration.
Learners improve science education leadership competencies by at least two levels over four weeks by reflecting on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
